body: The current spack refers to [jratcliff63367/sse2neon](https://github.com/jratcliff63367/sse2neon) which is NO LONGER considered the official depot for SSE2NEON. Instead, the official SSE2NEON is now [DLTcollab/sse2neon](https://github.com/DLTcollab/sse2neon). This pull request attempts to redirect SSE2NEON package to the latest repository, adapt the existing packages depending on SSE2NEON and remove out-of-date copy of SSE2NEON.
title: SS2NEON transition
